channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Investigators to wrap up public hearings into fatal midair crash between Army chopper and airplane
item.description: The National Transportation Safety Board will wrap up its public testimony on Friday about the fatal midair crash between an Army helicopter and a commercial jet earlier this year.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from ending protections for 60,000 from Central America and Nepal
